content: There’s the UX designer and then there’s the UX designer The problem with the title of UX Designer is that it can be as important or as trivial as the person wants it to be. There’s no implied responsibility that titles such as Software Architect, Software Engineer and Software Programmer have. If shit happens you can’t really say: Don’t look at me I’m just the architect. But if you’re a designer and shit happens, it seems easier to say: Don’t look at me I just design it. I didn’t create it.
